channel.title: [317] Gray Triangles in Dungeon Walls
channel.description:
I have noticed that there are these triangles in the walls and it is bothering me. I would like to know where I would fix this at and how to (I am not very good on the client side).
Pictures:
[IMG]http://i62.tinypic.com/4qsrbr.png[/img] [IMG]http://i59.tinypic.com/259bt52.png[/img]

item.title: [317] Gray Triangles in Dungeon Walls
item.dc:creator: @Welliton_inc Welliton_inc
item.description:
@Welliton_inc wrote:

[quote=“DerpaDerpy, post:3, topic:551880”][quote author=sk8rdude461 link=topic=670796.msg4485569#msg4485569 date=1433792183]
Either A) You have bad object models, or B) You have bad readValues.
I’m not sure which, but that’s what I’m thinking it is.
[/quote]

So what do you suggest I do? Should I try to load new objects in or change my readvalues?[/quote]

Well, you can always overwrite the wrong model with the correct model by finding out what that current model is (which I don’t).

Read full topic
